attributes.action: Stop building houses on green belt land of Keresley , Coventry .
attributes.additional_details: David Wilson and Bellway already started Plans in building on the green belt . With Coventry Council having further plans for more roads and houses on all the green belt in Keresley . Concerns of Jobs in area as current residents can not find work at the moment . Flooding is an issue already within area and will get worse .
attributes.background: There is currently a plan to build over 3000 houses in the green belt land of Keresley , Coventry. There will also be many roads through the green belt where wild life is thriving due to not much land left within Coventry . All the Doctors and schools already full . There is plenty of brown fields.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
